products.name: Royal Indigo Heritage
products.description: A striking traditional smock in deep indigo featuring the classic square pattern weave. This piece honors the ancestral weaving traditions of Northern Ghana with authentic double-weave construction.
products.careInstructions: Hand wash in cool water. Air dry flat. Iron on medium heat with steam.
products.symbolism: Indigo represents authority, trust, and spiritual protection in Northern Ghanaian traditions. The square pattern symbolizes stability and connection to the land.
